Package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service

Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service.ProductService
@Service public class ProductService extends Object
This class provides business logic for managing products in the system. It uses the ProductRepository to store and retrieve products from the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProductService(ProductRepository productRepo)
    Autowire the ProductRepository to allow this class to interact with the database.
